response.overview: Mike's drum cam footage from the recording sessions of Transatlantic's album(s) The Absolute Universe...this is a unique version that combines both versions "The Breath Of Life" and "Forevermore"  Audio Options Include: • Full Band Mix • Isolated Drums & MP Vox • Headphone Mix (Stereo combo of both) • OVERTURE  • REACHING FOR THE SKY  • HIGHER THAN THE MORNING  • THE DARKNESS IN THE LIGHT  • TAKE NOW MY SOUL  • BULLY  • RAINBOW SKY  • LOOKING FOR THE LIGHT  • THE WORLD WE USED TO KNOW  • THE SUN COMES UP TODAY  • LOVE MADE A WAY (PRELUDE)  • OWL HOWL  • SOLITUDE  • BELONG  • LONESOME REBEL  • LOOKING FOR THE LIGHT (REPRISE)  • THE GREATEST STORY NEVER ENDS  • LOVE MADE A WAY
response.title: Mike Portnoy: The Absolute Universe
